item.title: Drafts for iPhone and iPad is the app you never knew you needed
item.description: On its surface, Drafts appears to be yet another note taking app for iOS. Once you dig into it, you begin to realize the power that it yields. After your start it (which is relatively quick even on my aging iPhone 4) you are greeted with a new note or â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
